Package Cmp3\ContentProcessing

Cross Media Publishing - CMP3 www.cross-media.net
LICENSE

Interface summary

ProcessorInterface Interface for content processors which are used to modifiy content objects.

Class summary

StripBBCode Content processors which removes bb code
HtmlEntityDecode Content processors which decodes HTML entities Decoding is done using utf-8 charset
StripTags Content processors which perform html striptags
UrlMarker Content processors which do a {URL} marker replacement.
FileWriter content processors which writes the content to a file - mostly used for debugging
BBCodeToHtml Content processors which performs bb to html code replacement
ContentProcessing Performs content processing using one or more processors
PdfOverlay Content processors which overlays two pdf files
HtmlMakePngBackgroundWhite Content processors which changes png images (with transparency) to png with whicht background.
XPathAbstract Content processors base class for xml xpath processing
RteDbToRte Content processors which perform TYPO3 DB content to RTE HTML
ProcessorAbstract Base class of content processors which are used to modifiy string content.
XPath_DataMerge Content processors which merges two xml files
HtmlSetTransparentBackground Content processors which add CSS to HTML content to set the background transparent.
HtmlMakeImgSrcAbsolute Content processors which changes img src to absolute
HtmlStripStyles Content processors which strip CSS sytles from HTML
PdfImpose Content processors which imposes pages of a pdf file
Exception ContentProcessing exception
HtmlExtractBody Content processors which perform fetching content from html body
RteToDb Content processors which perform RTE HTML to TYPO3 DB content
HtmlStripDoubleParagraphs Content processors which change multiple <p> to a single <p> in HTML
XPath_Typo3TableRender Content processors to convert a dom node with typo3 table format to xhtml
Xslt1 Content processors which processes XML with XSLT
HtmlMakeTypo3LinksAbsolute Content processors which changes links to absolute
Marker content processors which do a marker replacement
ReplaceAbstract Content processors which strip CSS sytles from HTML
HtmlAddStyles Content processors which adds css styles to html header
HtmlMakeClean Content processors which cleans HTML markup using t3lib_parsehtml::XHTML_clean
HtmlToText Content processors which performs HTML to text conversation which tries to be more nice than strip_tags()
RteDbToHtml Content processors which perform RTE-TYPO3 DB content to HTML transformation
HtmlMakeLinksAbsolute Content processors which changes links to absolute
XPath_ImageMeta Content processors which generates meta data for images like height and width
XPath_Typo3RteRender Content processors to convert a dom node with typo3 rte format to xhtml
Replace Content processors which perform str_replace and preg_replace.
XPath_QRCode Content processors which generates qrcodes
